Specific Details: To work with local councillors to bring a motion to their local authority supporting the right of disabled people to have a right to personal assistance

Subject Matter: To work with local councillors to bring a motion to their local authority supporting the right of disabled people to have a right to personal assistance
Intended Results: That local authorities would debate a motion of the right for disabled people to a personal assistance service to live their lives independently
Lobbying Activities: Email sent to councilors on specific local authorities.|Email|1
